Windlord/Nighlight::

Windlord felt as if he had betrayed his friends. "No Aerotaur" he 
said softly while he saw his friend flew away "They need OUR help..."

*****************
Nightlight::

Nightlight recived Aerotaur's menssage "They seem be two..." she 
answered "Perplex and I are ready to leave and face them..."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Wilthram Ponth" <Rudra656@a...> wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>       "Windlord we have to go NOW!  No stay if you must. I'm 
> leaving.  Nightlight and Trinity nead my help.   I'm going!  Come 
> back as soon as you can."  Aerotaur transforms into roc mode and 
flew 
> off toward his base.  On the way he sends a message to 
> Nightlight.  "I'm coming.  How many enemies are there?"
